name: Sugar Glider (SugarBuddies)
description:
How cute is a Sugar Glider ? Never too much for sure ! 

Sugar Glider is a small side-scroller game created in Lua using Löve. 

We created this game for the VideoGamesLab Game Jam 2021 ! 

Sadly didn't manage to export it in a web browser format but please take a minute to download and try this cute and absolutely time-consuming game ! 

Commands : ZQSD or arrows
